"Oh. Hello.":
"I don't know your inclinations, and I mean
no offense, but I do so detest Hunters."

"I encountered one in an ambush earlier and
I had to fight alongside him. He was more of
a nuisance than a help, frankly."

"I suppose he thought by serving as a wall he
was protecting me from the enemy. In reality,
it was the other way around."

"I dislike things I don't understand, and there are
few things I understand less than Hunters.
Give me a competent, logical Wizard any day."

"……あの……あなたのことを
悪く言うわけじゃないけど
私、やっぱりハンターは嫌い。"

"……この前、戦場で出会って
やむをえず一緒に戦ったんだけど
あちこち動き回って……正直邪魔。"

"……頼んでもいないのに
壁になろうとするし……
何がしたいんだかわからない。"

"……理解できないものは嫌い。
だから私はハンターが嫌い。
フォースが、一番いい。"
